alert.note: Alert for Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 23 at 9:44PM CDT until further notice by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Forecast flooding changed from Minor to Moderate severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in North Dakota... Maple River near Mapleton (South of I-94) affecting Cass County. Pembina River at Neche affecting Pembina County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pembina River at Neche. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, ND State Hwy 18 is inundated at Neche. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 9.7 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage Monday afternoon to 18.7 feet early Tuesday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late Wednesday morning to 17.4 feet and begin rising again early Friday morning. It will then rise above flood stage again Friday afternoon. - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
